meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>oil</kanji> <kanji>rice paddy</kanji> is really more like an <vocabulary>oil field</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. You haven't learned this reading for 田 yet. Just think about how you walk into the <vocabulary>oil field</vocabulary> and you see a bear <reading>den</reading> (でん), filled with oil.
